What's New

Be sure to back up your files before updating!

We are nothing without you! Thanks to all of you who have contributed in every update. That let me know about bugs, feature requests, pages, or just ask about how to get started. We really appreciate it!

v1.0.2 (June 22, 2018)

  • Overview
    • Added footer section
    • Added package-lock.json to ship folder to avoid failed installation on windows machines
    • Added the basic compilation on README file
    • Added table filter page (big filtering form for table view)
    • Added jsTree plugin
    • Added Summernote plugin
    • Added Bootstrap TouchSpin plugin (number input)
    • Deprecated Bootstrap Treeview plugin (will remove on next release)
    • Addressing details information for plugins (plugins docs)
    • Renamed app-tasks page to app-board
    • Truncated long menu and .btn-account on aside panel
    • Removed Bower from our Build System
    • Fixed loader on floating label (form input)
    • Fixed missing .tile-xl and .tile-xxl
    • Fixed not appropriate line-height on some components (button, input, nav-link, tile, avatar, etc)
    • Fixed minor bugs and broken links
  • Build Tools
    • package.json, gulpfile.js — say goodbye to Bower! Now all we need is npm install. See Build Tools for more details
  • Design
    • _footer.scss — add footer section
    • _table-filters-datatables.html — big filtering form for table view
  • SCSS
    • _tiles.scss — add .tile-xl and .tile-xxl
    • _buttons.scss — truncated long text on .btn-account
    • _plugins.scss — truncated long text stacked-menu
    • _plugins.scss — aligned .menu-icon
    • _avatar.scss — refactoring
    • _forms.scss — fixed loader on floating label
    • _variable-overrides.scss — fixed line height
    • _alert.scss — fixed line height
    • _badge.scss — fixed line height
    • _buttons.scss — fixed line height
    • _custom-forms.scss — fixed line height
    • _dropdowns.scss — fixed line height
    • _forms.scss — fixed line height
    • _input-group.scss — fixed line height
    • _navs.scss — fixed line height
    • _tables.scss — fixed line height
    • _avatars.scss — fixed line height
    • _plugins.scss — fixed line height
    • _publisher.scss — fixed line height
    • _tiles.scss — fixed line height
    • _variables.scss — fixed line height
  • JS
    • _main.js — refactoring
    • _table-filters-demo.js — big filtering form for table view
  • Dependencies
    • Added Summernote
    • Added Bootstrap TouchSpin
    • Added jsTree
    • Deprecated Bootstrap Treeview plugin — will remove on next release
    • Update blueimp-file-upload to 9.22.0
    • Update datatables.net to 1.10.18
    • Update datatables.net-autofill to 2.3.0
    • Update datatables.net-autofill-bs4 to 2.3.0
    • Update datatables.net-bs4 to 1.10.18
    • Update datatables.net-buttons to 1.5.2
    • Update datatables.net-buttons-bs4 to 1.5.2
    • Update datatables.net-colreorder to 1.5.0
    • Update datatables.net-colreorder-bs4 to 1.5.0
    • Update datatables.net-fixedcolumns to 3.2.5
    • Update datatables.net-fixedcolumns-bs4 to 3.2.5
    • Update datatables.net-fixedheader to 3.1.4
    • Update datatables.net-fixedheader-bs4 to 3.1.4
    • Update datatables.net-keytable to 2.4.0
    • Update datatables.net-keytable-bs4 to 2.4.0
    • Update datatables.net-responsive to 2.2.2
    • Update datatables.net-responsive-bs4 to 2.2.2
    • Update datatables.net-rowgroup to 1.0.3
    • Update datatables.net-rowgroup-bs4 to 1.0.3
    • Update datatables.net-rowreorder to 1.2.4
    • Update datatables.net-rowreorder-bs4 to 1.2.4
    • Update datatables.net-scroller to 1.5.0
    • Update datatables.net-scroller-bs4 to 1.5.0
    • Update datatables.net-select to 1.2.6
    • Update datatables.net-select-bs4 to 1.2.6
    • Update katex to 0.10.0-beta
    • Update plyr to 3.3.20
  • Documentation
    • components-plugins.html — addressing details information for plugins

v1.0.1 (May 13, 2018)

  • Overview
    • Update Bootstrap to v4.1.1
    • Move up the layouts navigation
    • Refactoring form-basic page to provide a better experience for you
    • Fixed unconsistent style on some components states (btn-account, form validation, etc)
    • Added interactivity checkbox on table-basic page
    • Included datatables buttons to datatables page
    • Integrated photoswipe to feeds and conversation page
    • Updated dependencies to latest version
    • Fixed some minor bugs on looper styles
  • SCSS
    • _variable-overrides.scss — change table hover background color
    • _custom-forms.scss — add .custom-control-nolabel class
    • _forms.scss — decrease legend font size
    • _forms.scss — fix validation states
    • _input-group.scss — support .loader-sm to use in form add-on elements
    • _input-group.scss — change .input-group-text color
    • _navs.scss — fix floating badge on .nav-header
    • _tables.scss — fix dropdown arrow bug on .thead-dd
    • _rating.scss — only support colors name instead of theme colors for variants
    • _switcher.scss — only support success and danger variants
    • _aside.scss — fix btn-account :active state
  • JS
    • main.js — add method handlePasswordVisibility()
    • main.js — add method handleIndeterminateCheckboxes()
    • main.js — add method handleFormValidation()
    • datatables-demo.js — add datatables buttons extension
    • table-demo.js — add interactivity checkbox
  • Dependencies
    • Update bootstrap to v4.1.1
    • Update plyr to v3.3.7
    • Update select2 to v4.0.6-rc.1
    • Update flatpickr to v4.4.6
    • Update fontawesome to v5.0.13
    • Update clipboard to v2.0.1

v1.0.0 (April 28, 2018)

  • Initial release
